data.description: With the bottom thickness you can set the thickness of the solidly printed bottom layers of the print. A higher value ensures all gaps on the bottom layers are closed completely. However, this can also increase the print time and amount of filament used.
data.img_description: This image shows all parts affected by the bottom thickness setting.
data.hints: - With the bottom thickness you can set the thickness of the solid printed bottom layers of the print. A higher value ensures all gaps on the bottom layers close completely. On the other hand, this can also increase the print time and the amount of filament used.
